messages.subject: NVC - thanks
messages.msgSnippet: Joan, I just got Grossman s book on NVC in the mail last week.  I got it because for a few years it has popped up in conversation in various circles of mine.
messages.messageBody:
Joan, I just got Grossman's book on NVC in the mail last week. I got it
because for a few years it has popped up in conversation in various
circles of mine. I don't have time to read it right away, and just
wanted to thank you for your writing on the topic. I have joined the
NVC parenting group, and that is wonderful as well. Your posts
illuminate this process very clearly (to me). Thanks!



Peace,

Andrea

mom to Tobin (4)



I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in
which they can learn. - Einstein





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
